channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2 for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2 for Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-27558|2024-08-02T12:16:35.677Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 on Windows 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 may be vulnerable to a privilege escalation caused by at least one installed service using an unquoted service path. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges by inserting an executable file in the path of the affected service. IBM X-Force ID: 249194.
